original_title: Luke and Brie Are on a First Date
overview: It is the first date of Luke and Brie. They will spend the night together at bars, parties and streets of Los Angeles. The risk of a first encounter, and the relentless pursuit of naturalness, will make their relationship dance between flirting and misunderstandings
tagline: It seems to be going well
title: Luke and Brie Are on a First Date
